summary: A female Nord Follower from the Snowpride, a long forgotten band of warriors. Amabella Snowpride is on a quest to find an ancient stolen artifact, The Snowpride Shield.
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Q7evadx.jpg[/img]
[font=Times New Roman][/font][/center][center][font=Times New Roman]
[color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]Description[/b]

[/size][/color][size=3]A female Nord Follower from the Snowpride, a long forgotten band of warriors.
[/size][size=3]Amabella Snowpride is on a quest to find an ancient stolen artifact, The Snowpride Shield.

[/size][color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]Requirements[/b]
[/size][/color][size=3]
Latest Skyrim Update
[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D10168&pUp=1]Apachii Hair 1.5


[img]http://i.imgur.com/4xczPPL.jpg[/img]


[/url][/size][color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]Features[/b][/size][/color][color=#ff0000]
[/color][size=3][color=#ff0000]
Simple follower located at Moorside Inn, Morthal[/color]
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Class: Two Handed Warrior
[/size][size=3]Perks: Two Handed / Heavy Armor / Block / Sneak / Lightfoot / Restoration
[/size][size=3]Spells: Heal / Heal Others
[/size][size=3]Other: Marriage Enabled[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]
Will use your installed body type and textures.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Amabellas' default outfit is a robe, so she will equip any armor given. 
[/size][size=3]Her inventory contains Steel Plate Armor and a Skyforge Steel Greatsword, you can remove this from the inventory at any time.
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3][color=#ff0000]Quest[/color] 
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]A short, simple and scriptless quest
(no way markers, no quest log)
[/size][size=3]To start the quest simply read the journal in Amabellas' Inventory. 
[/size][size=3]A clue to the location will be found within.[/size][size=3]
[/size][color=#ff0000][size=3]
Two new Skill Books[/size][/color][size=3]
[/size][size=3]
Heavy Armor and Two Handed.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]
[color=#ff0000]A new shield [/color]

Enchantable and improvable. Based on Iron armor crafting.

[/size][color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]Installation / Uninstall[/b]

[/size][/color][size=3]Install with NMM or you favourite mod manager
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]Uninstall with NMM or your favourite mod manager[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]
Thanks to a scriptless quest it is safe to remove this mod at any time, [/size][size=3]but be sure to dismiss your follower first.


[/size][color=#1e84cc][size=4][b]Permissions[/b]

[/size][/color][size=3]No original content from this mod may be edited or reuploaded in a published mod.
[/size][size=3]Offers of translations will be considered.[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman]
